reviewText: I chose this DVD because My grand daughter is very fond of animals,  I always watch the show in TV and I knew that the funny acts performed by animals will make her laugh.  I was right and I recommend this item for kids of all ages..even senior citizens.
I bought it for my sister coz she love pet. It's not funny at all. I cant blam her that cant finish it when we watch together.
It's really hard to find any funny animal videos!  My handicapped grandson loves to watch these and I was happy with this one.  I wish there were more like it.
